SELECT age_group, COUNT(*) as count FROM ( SELECT member_birthday, CASE WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), member_birthday) / 365) BETWEEN 0 AND 19 THEN '10대 이하' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), member_birthday) / 365) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), member_birthday) / 365) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), member_birthday) / 365) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40대' WHEN FLOOR(DATEDIFF(CURDATE(), member_birthday) / 365) BETWEEN 50 AND 59 THEN '50대' ELSE '60대 이상' END AS age_group FROM user ) AS age_groups GROUP BY age_group;
